notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: J.A., K.A.B. and R.B. conceived the study with input from N.S. and J.S.; J.A. compiled life-history data and conducted the meta-analysis; R.S. collected archaeofaunal data and J.A. compiled the database for the metapopulation model; J.A., K.A.B. and R.B. developed, implemented and analysed the metapopulation model; J.A., K.A.B. and R.B. wrote the first draft of the paper and all authors discussed the results and contributed to the manuscript.
